survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and impact of the corporate mindfulness program.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate mindfulness program activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate mindfulness program activities?

questions.question_text: Which mindfulness activities have you found most beneficial? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mindfulness apps provided by the company
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes for this question to allow multiple selections.

answer_options: Mindfulness apps provided by the company

questions.question_text: How has the mindfulness program impacted your work-life balance?

script.question_text: How has the mindfulness program impacted your work-life balance?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the corporate mindfulness program?

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the corporate mindfulness program?
